item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Isman H. Suryaman
item.description: "Finding a life partner is like choosing a bed. You need one as a friend either in times of health or sickness. Freshness or weariness. Happiness or sadness. And we can be certain that we've picked the right one without having to sleep with it first." -- Isman H. Suryaman

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Isman H. Suryaman
item.description: "A wise man (or the first comedian in history) once said, "If you wish to make God laugh, tell him your plans." This is why during praying, I occasionally slip in my business plans. If there were an internet of somekind in heaven, my story would've been forwarded to everyone even before lunch break." -- Isman H. Suryaman

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "If I can stop one heart from breaking, I shall not live in vain." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "And by the way, everything in life is writable about if you have the outgoing guts to do it, and the imagination to improvise. The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "If you can't change your fate, change your attitude." -- Amy Tan

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "Chance is the first step you take, luck is what comes afterward." -- Amy Tan

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "Love is the essence of life. " -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "You're only a victim when you allow yourself to be one. " -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "Love is like flowers blossoming in spring. When you think it ends, itâ€™ll grow again in time." -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Tom Clancy
item.description: "The difference between fiction and reality? Fiction has to make sense." -- Tom Clancy

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "When asked, "How do you write?" I invariably answer, "One word at a time," and the answer is invariably dismissed. But that is all it is. It sounds too simple to be true, but consider the Great Wall of China, if you will: one stone at a time, man. That's all. One stone at a time. But I've read you can see that motherfucker from space without a telescope." -- Stephen King

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by J.D. Robb
item.description: "There are no dead ends, just detours." -- J.D. Robb

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "Good fiction creates its own reality." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "Rahasiaku produktif menulis? Hanya satu kata: NIAT." -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "I don't like sycophants. Unless you're a cat." -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "When you think you know everything, it means that you actually know nothing." -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "Some friends gladly stay, some move away. Some come and go, but their affections grow. While some, I recall, are not friends at all." -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "Perhaps people hate because it's more difficult to love. It also takes more courage to do the latter." -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "It's not how great the ideas are. It's about how you write them, to make them great." -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "But what is love, and what is life, if you do not let yourself live?" -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "Love changes you and people around you." -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "If there were two enemies hating each other for a long time, to me, the winner would be the one who finally has the courage to forgive." -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "We stop being humane when we lose the ability to dream." -- Primadonna Angela

item.title: Primadonna add a quote by Primadonna Angela
item.description: "Semua orang bisa saja memuji dan memuja, tapi waktu juga yang akan menentukan tulus tidaknya." -- Primadonna Angela
